name: Hermina and Culus: Atelier Lilie Another Story
summary: The young alchemist Hermina has created an homunculus by the name Culus. The homunculus cannot show many expression or say many words, but Culus learns new words from the people of Salburg. Eventually the player can use the words Culus have learnt to become Hermina's friend.

alternative_names.name: ~Herumīna to Kurusu ~Rirī no Atorie Mou Hitotsu no Monogatari~
ヘルミーナとクルス ~リリーのアトリエ もう一つの物語
